snippet.title: Early Access Trailer - Terminal Defense (2018)
snippet.description:
In this arcade-style game, you take control of an antivirus program, and your goal is to eliminate malware. Take down hordes of enemies, collect ammo and health to get a high score, and stay alive for as long as possible.

This trailer is of the early access build of Terminal Defense. The game could change quite a bit during development. If you do play the game, I would appreciate if you give some criticism to improve the gameplay experience

This trailer shows of gameplay footage. if you think the game looks fun, you can download the game in the links below

For more info, and higher quality trailer, go to the game's website:
https://unknownvarstudios.wixsite.com/terminal-defence

Gamejolt Page:
https://gamejolt.com/games/Terminal_Defense/333343

We're on itch.io now!
https://unknown-variable-studios.itch.io/terminal-defense
Music from Jukedeck - create your own at http://jukedeck.com
